citeinfo.origin: Geospatial Imaging and Informatics Facility, College of Natural Resources, University of California, Berkeley
citeinfo.title: Wieslander Vegetation Type Mapping Project: All Plot Locations

descript.abstract: The Wieslander Vegetation Type Map (VTM) collection is a dataset compiled in the 1920s and 30s, consisting of photos, species inventories, plot maps, and vegetation maps covering most of California. The VTM plots represent locations of the original surveys.
descript.purpose: These data were digitized from paper maps for use in geographic information systems and digital distribution.

theme.themekey: california vegetation "vegetation type map" ecology "historical ecology"

cntorgp.cntorg: Geospatial Imaging and Informatics Facility, College of Natural Resources, University of California, Berkeley

dataqual.logic: All points are repsented as shapefile points. PLOTKEY is the concatenation of the QUAD and POINTID.
dataqual.complete: All VTM plot locations present on the VTM plot map for this quad appear in these data. Some plots may be present that do not appear in the corresponding plot data, due to loss of the original plot datasheets. Also, plots that appear in the plot data may not appear on the plot map due to omissions on the original VTM plot map.

horizpa.horizpar: Georeferencing and digitizing the VTM plots involved multiple steps, each of which introduced error. See http://giifweb.cnr.berkeley.edu/vtm/about/plotmaps.php for more information.

qhorizpa.horizpae: Total horizontal error in meters, calculated by taking the square root of the sum of the squares of each component error.

citeinfo.title: Wieslander Vegetation Type Mapping Project: Plot Maps

srcinfo.srccontr: The georeferenced scan of the VTM plot map showing locations of the VTM plots for this quad was used to as the basis for these plot locations.

procstep.procdesc: This shapefile was create by manually creating point in the center of the red circles indicating plot locations on the georeferenced VTM plot map. POINTID was manually entered, while PLOTKEY, QUAD, and ERROR were calculated.

enttyp.enttypd: Wieslander Vegetation Type Mapping Project: All Plot Locations

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Unique identifier for the plot. Format is <quad code><row><column><number>, e.g. 65A12 for quad 65, row A, row 1, plot 2.
VTM quad code for the quad that contains the plot.
Identifier for each plot that is unique within the quad. The format is based on the map graticule: <row><column><number>, e.g. A12 for row A, column 1, plot 2
Total horizontal error, calculated by taking the square root of the sum of the squares of each component error.

cntorgp.cntorg: Geospatial Imaging and Informatics Facility, College of Natural Resources, University of California, Berkeley

onlinopt.accinstr: Visit web site and download a Plot Points Shapefile from the Data section
